channel.title: [508]Run Error![508]
channel.description:
Hi i just downloaded Palidino 76's blank 508 source and everything compiled fine. Then i tried to run it. Unfortunately, it didn't run :(.
Well to start off here is the Run script:
[code]@echo off cd ../bin "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_19\bin\java.exe" palidino76/rs2/Server 43594 pause[/code]
Then here is the Run error:
[code]java.net.BindException: Address already in use: JVM_Bind at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketBind(Native Method) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.bind(PlainSocketImpl.java:365) at java.net.ServerSocket.bind(ServerSocket.java:319) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(ServerSocket.java:185) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(ServerSocket.java:141) at palidino76.rs2.net.SocketListener.<init>(SocketListener.java:40) at palidino76.rs2.Server.main(Server.java:45) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
:confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:
Please can someone help!

item.title: [508]Run Error![508]

i know how to port forward it is just i dont like opening a bunch of ports up only a few.

But thank you again[/quote]

u only gotta open 43594

item.title: [508]Run Error![508]
item.dc:creator: @XRangdaltonX XRangdaltonX
item.description:
@XRangdaltonX wrote:

Either you’re running two runserver’s or if you have utorrent you need to change the port on utorrent to another one, no 43594.

Read full topic

item.title: [508]Run Error![508]
item.dc:creator: @Fall Fall
item.description:
@Fall wrote:

Hi i just downloaded Palidino 76’s blank 508 source and everything compiled fine. Then i tried to run it. Unfortunately, it didn’t run :(.

Well to start off here is the Run script:

@echo off cd ../bin "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_19\bin\java.exe" palidino76/rs2/Server 43594 pause

Then here is the Run error:

java.net.BindException: Address already in use: JVM_Bind at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketBind(Native Method) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.bind(PlainSocketImpl.java:365) at java.net.ServerSocket.bind(ServerSocket.java:319) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(ServerSocket.java:185) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(ServerSocket.java:141) at palidino76.rs2.net.SocketListener.<init>(SocketListener.java:40) at palidino76.rs2.Server.main(Server.java:45) Press any key to continue . . .

Please can someone help!
